Text:
Claire and Cid deliver the trounced Zenon adherents
to some guards on patrol...

*sigh* Good grief. Thanks to those cretins, now I'm
dripping with sweat.

Alright, I just hope I was able to pull off the
"ineffectual yet able to hold his own" actâ€”
Cid? Is something wrong?

...Oh! Uh, no, I was just thinking you might wanna
worry less about sweat and more about the blood
all over you...

You have a point... We'd make for quite the ghastly
sight if we went back to the dormitory like this.
Y-Yeah...
So...it's off to the baths for us!
Huh?
Sooo, what is this place?
You mean to tell me you don't know?

This is a bathing facility called a "spa" that opened
just recently. It's a revolutionary establishment
intended to help maintain beauty and health as
well as promote healing!
Wow. I didn't know we had one here.

Perhaps you should try showing a little more interest
in the world around you. I'll bet you don't know a
single useful business such as this, do you.

Such ignorance may very well leave you in a difficult
position someday.

What? No, it won't. If that ever happens, I'll just
ask you.
...L-Listen to you. You are such a spoiled child!
...Haha. You got me there.

If you're going to be so childish, perhaps we should
take a bath together like we used to? Do you need
your big sister to wash your hair for you?
Uh... You've gotta be joking.
You don't need to look so appalled!

I wasn't being serious, of course. And besides, there
are other customers here.

But you're saying if there weren't, you would've
meant it...?

Enough, just get in there! Wash all that grime off,
and have a relaxing soak!

Ahh... What a wonderful bath. Who knew a spacious tub
could feel so sublime?

That "sauna" was also a delight. A girl could get
used to all this!
I wonder if Cid is enjoying himself too...

(Hehe... Today turned into an impromptu day on the
town with him...)

(...but it seems to have cheered him up a bit, and he
even showed some signs of growth.)

(He still has that same helpless look to him, but I
should reevaluate how I think of him a little.)

Well, I suppose I should wrap this up. Cid is
probably done by now himself...
...Wait, heâ€™s nowhere to be found.
What could he be getting up to?

(Cid's always been relatively fond of baths since he
was a child and is the type to stay in for a long
time, but even then this is a tad excessive...)

(Oh no! What if he's gotten himself caught up in some
trouble like earlier?!)
Ulp... H-Help me, Claire...

(Or what if he's about to fall prey to some nefarious
wretch driven mad by his charms...?!)
S-Stop...! Don't do that...! Help me, Claire...
I must do something...!

(If someone dares harm my dear Cid, it doesn't matter
who they are! I will kill them with my own two hands...
I swear it!)
Whoa?! H-Hold on now! That's the men's bath, miss!

Yes, I know that. But my brother is in danger.
Do not try to stop me!
W-We can't let you in there!
Grr... Let go! Unhand me at once!
Ahh... Now that's what I call a bath...
...Whoa, what're you doing, Claire...?
Cid...! Oh, I'm so relieved... You're safe!
Safe? I mean, yeah, I was only taking a bath...

But it took you so long to come out that I started
thinking something happened to you and just got
so very worried...

W-Wait, don't tell me you were trying to come into
the men's bathing area...?!
Wh-What...? Is that wrong?

U-Uh... Haha... It's just that you're too much of a
worrywart.
...That's only because you're so defenseless.

But enough about that. Now that I know you're
safe...I suppose we should head home.
We only have a little time left before curfew.

*pant, pant* Didn't know I was gonna have to run like
this...right at the very end... And I just got done
cleaning all my old sweat off...

How pathetic. Did we have any other choice? There
was only a little time until they shut the gates.
Yeah, guess you're right.
Anyway, I'm gonna head to my room.
...Um, Cid?
Huh? What is it?
Well... About today, um...

B-Be grateful, understand? After all, your older
sister went out of her way to spend time with
you, all so that you could enjoy yourself!

And another thing! I saved you from a very perilous
situation!
You put in a good effort as well...

B-But! In my eyes you still have a very, very, VERY
long way to go! You need to stay humble and stick to
your training!
Is that clear? I know you understand!
Y-Yeah... I get it...
Good boy. Be seeing you...!

...It ended up taking an entire day, but... Well, I
guess it wasn't a complete waste.
Gah!!!

Oh, how stupid of me...! Why can't I simply pay him
an honest compliment... Ugh!
...Next time...I swear I'll do better!
